nodes.text: Star Wars Kids was a children's magazine series published by The Fan Club, Inc., as overseen by President Dan Madsen. The magazine, which billed itself as a supplement to Star Wars Insider magazine, lasted for nine issues, including an inaugural Sampler Issue, from September/October 1998 to Spring 2000.

Star Wars Kids succeeded an identically titled magazine series published by Scholastic from 1997 to 1999 and ran simultaneously with a third magazine series of the same name, also published by Scholastic as a supplement to the Star Wars: Episode I Adventures roleplaying game.
